name: Eat The Dots (Flightpath Entertainment)
description:
In this game, you use the WASD keys to move around a maze and collect dots and reach the exit in as short of a time as possible.

Changelog:

v0.32: Bug Fixes.

v0.31:  Bug Fixes.

v0.3:  Removes Level Selection Menu, a tutorial level was added, all levels are now procedurally generated,  including the home screen and tutorial, timers have been removed, and other minor changes.

v0.2:  Adds Level Selection Menu,  Revamps Home Menu, Adds Second Level, Adds Previous Time and Best Time trackers, and other minor changes.
